projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Cyph3r
projects.bodyText: Built a website for the college cybersecurity club using React.js, Node.js and Firebase, providing a platform for members to share resources and updates. Ensured secure user authentication and real-time data synchronization for enhanced user interaction.

projects.title: CSV Analyzer
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a CSV file analyzer that plots graphs and answers dataset-related queries using the LLaMA 2 model
 - Provided insightful visualizations and leveraged AI to generate accurate, context-aware responses for data analysis

projects.title: Efficient Learning App
projects.bodyText: Developed an AI-powered learning platform that generates prompts and custom content based on user specifications and learning methods. Leveraged advanced algorithms to provide personalized and efficient learning experiences tailored to individual needs

projects.title: Violence Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a violence detection system using a merged InceptionV3 and ConvLSTM model, achieving high accuracy in real-time video analysis 
 - This approach combines powerful feature extraction with temporal sequence learning to effectively identify violent activities.

projects.title: Resume builder
projects.bodyText: Developed a dynamic portfolio creator app using React.js, enabling users to customize and showcase their work seamlessly. Implemented responsive design and interactive features to enhance user experience and engagement.

projects.title: The Digital Heist
projects.bodyText: Created a college club event website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing an engaging platform for event announcements and registrations. Implemented interactive elements and responsive design to ensure seamless user experience across all devices.

projects.title: Text Summarization
projects.bodyText:
- Implemented a text summarization NLP project using AWS services, leveraging advanced natural language processing algorithms. 
 - Utilized AWS natural language processing tools to efficiently summarize large volumes of text data, providing concise and informative summaries. Integrated CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment and continuous improvement.

projects.title: Voice Assitant
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a voice assistant with Hindi language support, leveraging advanced natural language processing techniques and the Random Forest algorithm. 
 - Enabled seamless interaction in Hindi, utilizing Random Forest for intent recognition and response generation, enhancing user experience and accessibility.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an employee management system using Python, MySQL, and Tkinter, providing a user-friendly interface for managing employee data.
 - Integrated MySQL database for efficient storage and retrieval of employee information, enhancing data organization and management within the system.
